title: R&C Insurance Charges: Percentile from a Stemplot
question_text:
When paying medical and dental claims, an insurance company will only pay the amount that it deems reasonable and customary (R&C) for the procedure that has been performed.
It is time to update the R&C payment schedule for dental cleanings for adults and the insurance company has contacted a random sample of dentists to inquire about their charge for this procedure. Results are displayed below.
